description.value: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Humanoid Form]{Humanoid Form} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mirror Image]{Mirror Image} as 2nd-level arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
